div.pre: 52 Larissa environs (Zarkon?), Thessaly, 1962-1963 Burial: before 350 B.C. (Hackens) Contents: c. 2000 AR Larissa: st. (some) dr. (a great many) Locri Opuntii: st. (some) Boeotia: st. (many); dr.? Athens: tetradr. (at least one) Sicyon: st. (some) Disposition: Athens 2 (Larissa dr., Boeotia st.); G. Hirsch Sales June 25-8, 1963, nos. 1187-1200, 1207-9, 1212-6; Feb. 21-22, 1963, nos. 341-51, 368-374 Varoucha, A Delt 19 (1964), Chronika, pp. 8-9, illus. Hackens, RBN 1967, p. 250 Information from P. Franke who estimates that the hoard, of which he has some casts, origi- nally contained c. 4000 coins Possibly no. 55 below is part of this large hd.
